extension.dc:title: Plinian ManagementAndConservation Extension
extension.name: ManagementAndConservation
extension.dc:subject: plic:ManagementAndConservation; dwc:Taxon
extension.dc:description: Management: actions directed at conserving or restoring species. / Conservation: interventions undertaken designed to preserve species.

property.name: ManagementAndConservationType
property.dc:description: Type of management. A controlled vocabulary is recommended.

property.name: Objectives
property.dc:description: Specific purposes of the management actions. Each objective must be separated by ;
property.examples: (a) Within the framework of the National Environmental Management Act, to provide for;(i) The management and conservation of biological diversity within the Republic and of the components of such biological diversity;(iA) the need to protect the ecosystem as a whole, including species which are not targeted for exploitation.

property.name: ManagementPlan
property.dc:description: A plan guiding the overall management project.
property.examples: Bioregional plan contains measures for the effective management of biodiversity and the components of biodiversity in the region...

property.name: Actions
property.dc:description: List of actions. Individual tasks in which a management project can be atomized. Each action must be separated by ;
property.examples: The Minister may determine a region as a bioregion and publish a bioregional plan for that region either.; The MEC for environmental affairs may determine a region as a bioregion and publish a bioregional plan for that region only with the concurrence of the Minister.

property.name: ActionsType
property.dc:description: A controlled vocabulary defining the Action types (Term Type). Each action must have one type. In the case that one action doesn't have type then put blank. e.g: IUCN Conservation Actions Classification Scheme. Each level must be separated by '-' and each type must be separated by ';'
property.examples: 5 Law and policy - 5.4 Compliance and enforcement - 5.4.2 National level; 4 Education and awareness-4.1 Formal education

property.name: HumanAndEnvironmentalRelevance
property.dc:description: Impact or value an species has either on the environment or on humans, and that justify management measures.
